properties.name: Luzon Strait
properties.description: Critical passage between South China Sea and Pacific Ocean. Major chokepoint.
properties.historical_note: Heavily patrolled by US submarines. Major convoy interdiction area 1942-1945.

properties.name: Balabac Strait
properties.description: Narrow passage between Palawan and Borneo. Gateway to Sulu Sea.
properties.historical_note: Patrol area for submarines targeting traffic between Singapore and Manila

properties.name: Mindoro Strait (Verde Island Passage)
properties.description: Passage between Mindoro and Luzon. Approach to Manila Bay.
properties.historical_note: Approach to Manila. Heavy Japanese traffic.

properties.name: Cam Ranh Bay
properties.description: Major Japanese fleet anchorage and naval base on Vietnamese coast.
properties.historical_note: Primary Japanese fleet base in South China Sea. Major target for Allied submarines and aircraft.

properties.name: Manila Bay
properties.description: Major port and naval facility. Japanese-occupied 1942-1945.
properties.historical_note: Major Japanese supply hub. Liberation target 1945.

properties.name: Subic Bay
properties.description: Former US naval base, occupied by Japan 1942-1945.
